about_the_game:
Turn Slums into Sanctuaries, One Bubble at a Time

Step into a world of satisfying transformation—where dirt vanishes, trash explodes, and every space you touch becomes pristine. Welcome to CleanTwin, a casual first-person cleaning adventure where you wield a powerful bubble gun to blast grime, destroy clutter, and restore messy environments. No stress. No enemies. No timer—Just the pure, relaxing joy of tidying up at your own pace.

Blast the Trash, Pop the Grime!

Your journey begins with the Bluegun, a powerful cleaning tool designed to scrub away filth and obliterate junk. Fire bubbles to wash walls, furniture, and floors, or shatter clutter into satisfying particles. Every cleaning action earns experience points, allowing you to unlock upgrades that make your tools even more effective.

Upgrade Your Tools

Cleaning has never felt this rewarding! Earn XP to level up and unlock 15 powerful upgrades across three categories:

Guns – Improve fire rate, range, and precision.

Bubbles – Boost splash size and bubble bounce mechanics.

Splashes – Enhance special paint effects for better movement.

Master Your Playstyle

Choose upgrades that match your playstyle with five unique skill paths:

 Strength (Red): Increase splash power, damage, and vaulting grip.

Speed (Yellow): Fire faster, move quicker, and dash further.

 Endurance (Green): Expand ammo, make bubbles bounce, and enhance jumps.

Wisdom (Blue): Extend range, improve accuracy, and gain bonus XP.

 Luck (Violet): Increase critical splash chances and slow time effects.

Paint Your Way – Creative Parkour Abilities!

Beyond cleaning, unlock paint-powered mobility tools to move through tricky spaces with style. Use special paint splats to vault, slide, speed up, jump higher, or even stick to walls!

Splats fade naturally over time or can be erased instantly with the Bluegun to keep your workspace tidy. Paint guns are optional, but they make your cleaning journey even more dynamic and fun!

What to Expect from CleanTwin:

  • Relaxing Gameplay – No timers, no enemies, no stress—just pure cleaning fun.

  • Rewarding Progression – Gain XP, level up, and unlock meaningful upgrades.

  • Creative Exploration – Use paint-powered movement tools to navigate freely.

  • Charming Visuals – A vibrant, low-poly world full of satisfying transformations.

  • Hub-Based Levels – Start from a cozy central hub and restore messy locations.

  • Satisfying Feedback – Rich visual & audio cues enhance the joy of cleaning.

  • Sense of Accomplishment – Watch before-and-after transformations unfold in real-time.

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 / AMD RX 480
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Creative Sound Blaster Audigy
  • VR Support: N/A

short_description: Blast away grime and clutter with your BubbleGun, turning filthy spaces into pristine sanctuaries. Pop muck and debris to earn experience, level up, and upgrade your gear. Hone your skills to uncover hidden stains, track down junk, and savor the soothing satisfaction of restoring beauty and order.
